entities.description: Harry's brother, mentioned as a natural at keeping secrets and lies.

entities.name: albus
entities.description: Harry's brother, mentioned as a natural at keeping secrets and lies. Also referred to as Albus Dumbledore.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The narrator of the story, who is looking around the room.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A person in the room who asks about Mr. Dumbledore's sister Ariana.

entities.name: aberforth
entities.description: Mr. Dumbledore, who is being asked about his sister Ariana.

entities.name: rita skeeter
entities.description: A person whose book Mr. Dumbledore's brother Albus is mentioned in.

entities.name: ariana
entities.description: Mr. Dumbledore's sister, who is the subject of a painting in the room.

relationships.description: Aberforth is referred to as Ariana's brother, indicating a family relationship between them.
Harry and Aberforth seem to know each other, with Harry looking around the room where Aberforth is standing.
